text: <@U2TD4Q7NW> awesome, I will take a look
<@U0Z41KY5V> I suppose <@U0UHG4VP1> or <@U11HH3P7Y> would know best.  I thought we were no longer using but I might be wrong.
sure, let’s confirm that and i will update the patch accordingly
I don't know if anyone outside of HYP infra is using Travis
<@U0UHG4VP1> So you suggest we keep the existing travis config and maybe remove it in future if no body used that?

<@U0Z41KY5V>: I know <@U0KPFAZNF> was talking a while ago about using something like that to drive builds, but AFAIK we aren't. Personally, I would remove it instead of updating it _if I knew nobody else was using it_. Perhaps you could send an email to the list and ask? Or submit a changeset and send an email?
<@U0Z41KY5V> also, if anyone else _is using it_, and you _are not using it_, shouldn't it be on the user to update it?
What drove you to update it? was it breaking stuff somewhere else?
If it’s still in-use, need to update to the golang1.7 env checking.
However, in case someone is using, i will send a email to the list too, thanks Ry!
